quotes.quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
Power over others is weakness disguised as strength.
Weakness is what brings ignorance, cheapness, racism, homophobia, desperation, cruelty, brutality, all these things that will keep a society chained to the ground, one foot nailed to the floor.
Every weakness contains within itself a strength.
To share your weakness is to make yourself vulnerable; to make yourself vulnerable is to show your strength.

No one wants to believe they are weak, but we all have weakness inside us. We have strength, too, but there are times when the circumstances in our lives are so overwhelming that we easily succumb to that weakness.
If your weakness is love then you are extremely strong.
Power corrupts the few, while weakness corrupts the many.
Don’t weaken yourself by surrendering to your weaknesses. Strengthen yourself by conquering your weaknesses.
A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.
Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.
Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.
Within our perceived weaknesses and imperfections lies the key to realizing our true strength.
Credulity is the man's weakness, but the child's strength.

No one enjoys feeling weak, whether it is emotionally, spiritually or physically. There is something within the human spirit that wants to resist the thought of weakness. Many times this is nothing more than our human pride at work. Just as weakness carries a great potential for strength, pride carries an equally great potential for defeat.
Only strength can cooperate. Weakness can only beg.
Weakness is subjective. We are weak for the people we love. And to others, we are the rigid mountains.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
All cruelty springs from weakness.
A person’s strength was always his weakness, and vice versa.
When you go looking for rescue, you end up trapped in your own weakness.
Love's weaknesses are better than hate's strengths.
Never be afraid to expose a weakness in yourself. Exposing a weakness is the beginning of strength.
To rush into explanations is always a sign of weakness.
Once we know our weaknesses they cease to do us any harm.
Weakness and ambivalence lead to war.
Be careful who you share your weakness with. Some people can’t wait for the opportunity to use them against you.
Even the strongest enemy had a weakness.
The weak may be joked out of anything but their weakness.
My strength and my weakness are twins in the same womb.
